short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find out if you're getting the best value for your hard-earned points.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For users wishing to book an award stay on Marriott.com using the Bonvoy program, it can be challenging to ascertain the value of their points. However, our extension simplifies this process. When using the award search page, the extension will display the 'cents per point' (cpp) for all listed hotels. For example, a 2-night stay at Property X might require 150,000 points. If the cash rate for the same stay is $250, this translates into a cpp value of 0.33. While this value might be acceptable for some, others might prefer to optimize their points, aiming for at least 1cpp. Our extension facilitates this decision-making process, making it much easier to maximize the value of your points.
